markdown:
Sky dragons live above the clouds near the summits of mountains. They maintain a strong religious tradition, a unique practice among imperial dragons that sets them apart as much as their wings do. Desperate souls risk steep cliffs and loose snow to seek these dragons' counsel, and most sky dragons gladly help those who make the journey, but they expel any express hostilities or badger without hesitation. The sky dragon's wings aren't true wings, but long fins fused to their forearms; their scales also form only very slowly. Young dragons coil tightly in their lairs as they absorb minerals that color and harden their scales. Even adults often wrap around pillars out of habit. **[Recall Knowledge - Dragon](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)): DC 28 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23 [Young Sky Dragon](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1128) **Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 79 **Perception** +19; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 60 feet **Languages** [Auran](/Languages.aspx?ID=15), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +16, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +19, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +16, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +18, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +19, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +18, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +18, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +17 **Str** +6 **Dex** +1 **Con** +3 **Int** +1 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +3 **Mist Vision** Fog and mist don't impair a sky dragon's vision; they ignore the [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) condition from fog and mist. --- **AC** 28 **Fort** +18 **Ref** +16 **Will** +21 **HP** 155 **Immunities** electricity, [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145) **Countered by Fire** If the sky dragon takes fire damage, the elemental magic of metal within them is tempered. Until the end of their next turn, they take a –1 circumstance penalty to attack rolls and AC, and their jaws Strikes don't deal electricity damage. This limitation ends if the dragon uses Breath Weapon.
**Fed by Earth** ([abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) When a sky dragon is targeted by an [earth](/Traits.aspx?ID=55) spell or effect, they leave a cloud of pulverized dust and gravel that swirls in the eddies of the dragon's flight. For 1 minute, the dragon is [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) while flying.
**[Frightful Presence](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=17)** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) 90 feet, DC 26 --- **Speed** 30 feet, fly 120 feet **Melee** jaws +21 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d8+12 piercing plus 1d12 electricity **Melee** claw +21 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)), **Damage** 2d8+12 slashing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) **Melee** tail +21 ([reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 2d8+12 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) **Divine Innate Spells** DC 28 - **1st** [Feather Fall](/Spells.aspx?ID=111), [Gust of Wind](/Spells.aspx?ID=143) - **2nd** [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) **Breath Weapon** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) The dragon shoots a ball of electricity that deals 5d12 electricity damage in a 20-foot burst within 40 feet (DC 28 basic Reflex save). They can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds. **Coiling Frenzy** The dragon makes one claw Strike and one tail Strike in either order, each against the same target. If either Strike hits, the dragon automatically [Grabs](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) the target. **[Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=10)** 2d8+7 bludgeoning, DC 24 **Draconic Momentum** The dragon recharges their Breath Weapon whenever they score a critical hit with a Strike. **Perfected Flight** A sky dragon can hover in place without spending an action, and they automatically succeed at all [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) checks to [Maneuver in Flight](/Actions.aspx?ID=30).
name: Young Sky Dragon
